Lady Gaga po A Star is Born natočí ďalší film. Drámu o vražde vnuka známeho módneho návrhára Gucciho režíruje Ridley Scott
03 Nov 2019, 11:29 by Timea Krauszová

Hviezdna dvojica bude pracovať na snímke o talianskej láske, nevere a vražde.

Lady Gaga získala za svoju úlohu vo filme A Star is Born dve nominácie na Oscara (najlepšia herečka a najlepšia pôvodná filmová pieseň). Jej hit Shallow, ktorý s ňou nahral Bradley Cooper, zlatú sošku napokon aj získal. Odvtedy sa v žiadnom filme neobjavila, zmeniť to má režisér Ridley Scott.



Spolu budú pracovať na dráme o talianskej návrhárskej rodine Gucci, pričom Gaga si zahrá úlohu Patrizie Reggiani, bývalej manželky Maurizia Gucciho. Práve Patriziu v roku 1995 odsúdili za vraždu Maurizia po tom, čo ju podviedol. O dramatickej snímke ako prvý informoval Deadline.
Vzrušujúci príbeh o vražde, šialenstve, pôvabe a lakomstve
Scott pracuje s pôvodným scenárom od Roberta Bentivegna. Bentivegna ho napísal na základe knihy Sary Gay Forden s názvom The House of Gucci. Na produkcii snímky bude Scott spolupracovať aj so svojou manželkou, Gianninou Scott.
Britský režisér a producent už má za sebou množstvo filmov, vrátane niekoľkých snímok Alien,  film s Benom Affleckom a Mattom Damonom The Last Duel či mexickú gangsterovku All the Money in the World.
Lady Gaga nie je v svete filmov taká skúsená. V novinke sa popasuje s náročnou úlohou. Patrizia a Maurizio mali dve dcéry, Maurizio napriek tomu svoju manželku opustil kvôli inej žene. Aby toho nebolo málo, urobil to po tom, čo Patrizia absolvovala operáciu mozgu. Práve odstránenie tumoru neskôr jej deti považovali za skutočný dôvod, prečo zrežírovala vraždu svojho ex. Patrizia bola teda opustená a chorá žena, ktorá nezvládla rozchod a z pomsty nechala zavraždiť otca svojich detí.
Za jej čin ju odsúdili na 29 rokov vo väzení, na slobodu sa dostala v roku 2016, po 18 rokoch. Médiá z vraždy v tom čase urobili senzáciu a Patriziu nazývali čiernou vdovou. Uvidíme, ako sa Gage podarí túto postavu stvárniť.
Nateraz nemáme informácie o tom, kedy sa začne natáčanie.

ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
Lady Gaga after A Star is Born makes another movie. The drama about the murder of grandson of the famous fashion designer Gucci is directed by Ridley Scott
03 Nov 2019, 11:29 by Timea Krausz

The star pair will work on a film about Italian love, infidelity and murder.

Lady Gaga received two Oscar nominations (Best Actress and Best Original Song) for her role in A Star is Born. Her hit Shallow, which Bradley Cooper recorded with her, finally won the gold statuette. Since then, she has not appeared in any film, director Ridley Scott has to change it.



Together they will work on a drama about the Italian design family Gucci, with Gaga playing the role of Patrizia Reggiani, former wife of Maurizio Gucci. It was Patrizia who was convicted in 1995 for the murder of Maurizio after cheating on her. Deadline first reported the dramatic film.
An exciting story of murder, madness, grace and greed
Scott works with the original screenplay by Robert Bentivegn. Bentivegna wrote it based on Sara Gay Forden's book The House of Gucci. Scott will also work with his wife, Gianna Scott, to produce the film.
British director and producer has already made a number of films, including several Alien films, a film with Ben Affleck and Matt Damon The Last Duel, and the Mexican gangster film All the Money in the World.
Lady Gaga is not so experienced in the world of movies. In the novelty, it struggles with a difficult task. Patrizia and Maurizio had two daughters, yet Maurizio left his wife for another woman. To make matters worse, he did it after Patrizia had brain surgery. It was the removal of the tumor later that her children considered the real reason she directed the murder of her ex. Patrizia was then abandoned and a sick woman who had not managed to break up and had her children killed by revenge.
She was sentenced to 29 years in prison for her act, and was released in 2016 after 18 years. The murder media made a sensation at that time, calling Patrizia the black widow. We'll see how Gage manages to portray this character.
So far we have no information about when shooting starts.
